column4: Actually I've two screens, my 15" on my laptop and a new of 24", when I connect the new on the laptop (VGA) I can't have the 15" on the left of the 24", just a clone or nothing. An idea ? I'm using Ubuntu 10.04.3. Thanks.
do you have an ATI card?
i am using an intel, i just turned my laptops screen off
yes but it's better with two screens :D
And on KDE I can do that.
I'm upgrading my 10.04.3 to 10.10 and finally to 11.04 (for Unity)
i would suggest a fresh install of 11.04 koshie_
it's not a problem because I will buy an other PC, it's just for see if the upgrading are really dangerous / not clean
